title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a pot of salted water to a boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Fry pancetta in a pan until crispy.
Whisk eggs with grated parmesan in a bowl.
Drain pasta and quickly mix with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.
Season with black pepper and serve with extra parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka paste for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until lightly charred.
Sauté onion in butter until golden.
Add tomato puree and spices, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Crispy toasted bread topped with creamy smashed avocado, olive oil, and a sprinkle of chili flakes.
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden and crispy.
Mash avocado with olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread avocado mixture evenly on the toast.
Sprinkle with chili flakes if desired.
Serve immediately.

title: Beef Stroganoff
summary: Tender strips of beef cooked in a rich, creamy mushroom sauce, served over noodles or rice.
instructions: Season beef with salt and pepper, then sear until browned. Remove from pan.
Sauté onions and mushrooms in butter until softened.
Sprinkle flour, then stir in beef broth to make a sauce.
Return beef to pan, simmer for 10 minutes.
Stir in sour cream before serving.
Serve over noodles or rice.

title: Greek Salad
summary: A refreshing mix of cucumber, tomato, red onion, feta cheese, and olives tossed with olive oil.
instructions: Combine cucumber, tomatoes, onion, feta, and olives in a bowl.
Whisk olive oil, vinegar, oregano, salt, and pepper together.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
